Question.Subject: I live in an isolated area and im told I can only get big pond next g is there another provider?
Question.Content: as ive be waiting a month for big pond to send me the right modem. Do you know of annother internet provider that reach as far as next g?
Question.ChosenAnswer: If you live in an isolated area and you're after internet then you'll probabaly need to get satellite broadband. There are a number of providers which you should be able to find in your local phone book. Testra Next G phones usually only work if you're not too far out of a town.

Answer.Content: If you live in an isolated area and you're after internet then you'll probabaly need to get satellite broadband. There are a number of providers which you should be able to find in your local phone book. Testra Next G phones usually only work if you're not too far out of a town.
